The fi___ technique i_ to bat___ and th__ fry t__ chicken, and t__ other i_ to d__ the me__ in e__ and th__ coat i_ a mix____ of fl___ and bread______. I greatly prefer the latter because the crumbs create more surface area and therefore a more crispy and delectable crust.
data.answer: 做炸鸡有两种观点。第一种方法是先把鸡肉打面糊再炸，另一种方法是把鸡肉浸在鸡蛋里，然后裹上面粉和面包屑的混合物。我非常喜欢后者，因为面包屑可以创造更多的表面积，因此面包皮更脆，更美味。
